sn41.3:1.1: Ekam samayam sambahula thera bhikkhu macchikasande viharanti ambatakavane.
sn41.3:1.2: Atha kho citto gahapati yena thera bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva there bhikkhu abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho citto gahapati there bhikkhu etadavoca:
sn41.3:1.5: Atha kho citto gahapati theranam bhikkhunam adhivasanam viditva utthayasana there bhikkhu abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
sn41.3:1.6: Atha kho thera bhikkhu tassa rattiya accayena pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena cittassa gahapatissa nivesanam tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidimsu.
sn41.3:2.1: Atha kho citto gahapati yena thera bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva there bhikkhu abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho citto gahapati ayasmantam theram etadavoca:
sn41.3:2.2: “ya ima, bhante thera, anekavihita ditthiyo loke uppajjanti:
sn41.3:2.3: ‘sassato lokoti va, asassato lokoti va, antava lokoti va, anantava lokoti va, tam jivam tam sariranti va, annam jivam annam sariranti va, hoti tathagato param maranati va, na hoti tathagato param maranati va, hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param maranati va, neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti va.
sn41.3:2.4: Yani cimani dvasatthi ditthigatani brahmajale bhanitani;
sn41.3:2.5: ima nu kho, bhante, ditthiyo kismim sati honti, kismim asati na honti”ti?
sn41.3:3.1: Evam vutte, ayasma thero tunhi ahosi.
sn41.3:3.3: tatiyampi kho citto gahapati ayasmantam theram etadavoca:
sn41.3:3.4: “ya ima, bhante thera, anekavihita ditthiyo loke uppajjanti—
sn41.3:3.5: sassato lokoti va, asassato lokoti va, antava lokoti va, anantava lokoti va, tam jivam tam sariranti va, annam jivam annam sariranti va, hoti tathagato param maranati va, na hoti tathagato param maranati va, hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param maranati va, neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param maranati va.
sn41.3:3.6: Yani cimani dvasatthi ditthigatani brahmajale bhanitani;
sn41.3:3.7: ima nu kho, bhante, ditthiyo kismim sati honti, kismim asati na honti”ti?
sn41.3:3.8: Tatiyampi kho ayasma thero tunhi ahosi.
sn41.3:4.1: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma isidatto tasmim bhikkhusanghe sabbanavako hoti.
sn41.3:4.2: Atha kho ayasma isidatto ayasmantam theram etadavoca:
sn41.3:4.3: “byakaromaham, bhante thera, cittassa gahapatino etam panhan”ti?
sn41.3:4.4: “Byakarohi tvam, avuso isidatta, cittassa gahapatino etam panhan”ti.
sn41.3:4.6: ‘ya ima, bhante thera, anekavihita ditthiyo loke uppajjanti—
sn41.3:4.8: ima nu kho, bhante, ditthiyo kismim sati honti, kismim asati na honti’”ti?
sn41.3:4.10: “Ya ima, gahapati, anekavihita ditthiyo loke uppajjanti:
sn41.3:4.11: ‘sassato lokoti va, asassato lokoti va, antava lokoti va anantava lokoti va, tam jivam tam sariranti va, annam jivam annam sariranti va, hoti tathagato param maranati va, na hoti tathagato param maranati va, hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param maranati va, neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param maranati va.
sn41.3:4.12: Yani cimani dvasatthi ditthigatani brahmajale bhanitani;
sn41.3:4.13: ima kho, gahapati, ditthiyo sakkayaditthiya sati honti, sakkayaditthiya asati na honti’”ti.
sn41.3:5.2: “Idha, gahapati, assutava puthujjano ariyanam adassavi ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinito, sappurisanam adassavi sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinito
sn41.3:5.3: rupam attato samanupassati, rupavantam va attanam, attani va rupam, rupasmim va attanam;
sn41.3:5.7: vinnanam attato samanupassati, vinnanavantam va attanam, attani va vinnanam, vinnanasmim va attanam.
sn41.3:6.2: “Idha, gahapati, sutava ariyasavako ariyanam dassavi ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinito sappurisanam dassavi sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suvinito
sn41.3:6.3: na rupam attato samanupassati, na rupavantam va attanam, na attani va rupam, na rupasmim va attanam;
sn41.3:6.7: na vinnanam attato samanupassati, na vinnanavantam va attanam, na attani va vinnanam, na vinnanasmim va attanam.
sn41.3:6.8: Evam kho, gahapati, sakkayaditthi na hoti”ti.
sn41.3:7.3: “Atthi, bhante, avantiya isidatto nama kulaputto amhakam aditthasahayo pabbajito?
sn41.3:7.6: “Kaham nu kho so, bhante, ayasma etarahi viharati”ti?
sn41.3:7.7: Evam vutte, ayasma isidatto tunhi ahosi.
sn41.3:8.1: Atha kho citto gahapati ayasmato isidattassa bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva there bhikkhu panitena khadaniyena bhojaniyena sahattha santappesi sampavaresi.
sn41.3:8.2: Atha kho thera bhikkhu bhuttavino onitapattapanino utthayasana pakkamimsu.
sn41.3:8.3: Atha kho ayasma thero ayasmantam isidattam etadavoca:
sn41.3:8.4: “sadhu kho tam, avuso isidatta, eso panho patibhasi.
sn41.3:8.6: Tenahavuso isidatta, yada annathapi evarupo panho agaccheyya, tannevettha patibhaseyya”ti.
sn41.3:8.7: Atha kho ayasma isidatto senasanam samsametva pattacivaramadaya macchikasandamha pakkami.
sn41.3:8.8: Yam macchikasandamha pakkami, tatha pakkantova ahosi, na puna paccagacchiti.
